IDENTIFICACAO-DO-GRUPO.NOME-DA-INSTITUICAO: Universidade Estadual do Norte Fluminense Darcy Ribeiro
IDENTIFICACAO-DO-GRUPO.NOME-DO-GRUPO: GEMa - GROUP FOR ESPECIAL MATERIAIS / GRUPO DE ESTUDOS EM MATERIAIS AVANÇADOS

ENDERECO-INSTITUCIONAL-DO-GRUPO.COMPLEMENTO: Universidade Estadual do Norte Fluminense - UENF/CCT/LAMAV
ENDERECO-INSTITUCIONAL-DO-GRUPO.LOGRADOURO: Avenida Alberto Lamego - de 960 ao fim - lado par

IDENTIFICACAO-DO-GRUPO.REPERCUSSOES: GEMa's investigations are distributed in 3 fronts: (1) use of High Pressure - High Temperatures in the syntheses, and sintering of superhard materials (Diamond and cubic boron nitride - CBN), and hard materials such as carbides, oxides, nitrides, and especial metals. New materials for oil & gas industry drills are proposed. New materials for use as inserts for metalworking are developed ; (2) this second branch deals with the processing of cutting tools by means of hot-pressing (conventional or pulsed electric current sintering - PECS). The aim is to develop new alloys to adhere Diamond crystals so that tools' performance and lifetime are increased. Diamond tools are industrially produced. Metal matrix and ceramic matrix composites are PECS sintered, aiming at tailored properties for metalworking tools; (3) this line processes innovative biomaterials, such as titanium, refractory and especial alloys, advanced and natural ceramics. Characterizations include In-Vitro and In-Vivo tests.

TECNICO.TITULO-FAMILIA-OCUPACAO: PREPARADORES E OPERADORES DE MÁQUINAS-FERRAMENTA CONVENCIONAIS
PREPARADORES E OPERADORES DE MÁQUINAS-FERRAMENTA CONVENCIONAIS

LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.OBJETIVO-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Ti alloys with beta-stabilizers elements are developed by powder metallurgy. Refractory metals studies are conducted. Natural and artificial ceramic materials are processed by sintering. Biocompatibility studies highlights the researches.Ligas de titânio com elementos beta-estabilizadores são desenvolvidas via metalurgia do pó. Estudos em metais refratários são conduzidos. Materiais cerâmicos naturais e artificiais são processados via sinterização. Estudos culminam com a biocompatibilidade.

Metallic, ceramic materials and their composites are processed, aiming the development and/or improvement of new materials for cutting tools which are used in the metalworking sector (such as hardmetals) and ornamental stones¿ industry (such as diamond wires, saws, drills, etc).Aplicar a rota de sinterização a metais, cerâmicos e seus compósitos, visando o desenvolvimento de novos materiais para ferramentas de corte, destinadas aos setor metal mecânica e de rochas ornamentais.

SETOR-DE-APLICACAO.SUBSETOR: Fabricação de produtos de metal, exceto máquinas e equipamentos
